0.text: Innate: Whenever an enemy  champion or epic  monster dies, or  turret or inhibitor is destroyed, within 3 seconds of being damaged by Jinx, she gains  175% bonus movement speed which decays over 6 seconds.

1.text: Additionally, she gains  15% total attack speed and is allowed to exceed the attack speed cap for the same duration.

2.origin: COST: 20 MANA PER ATTACK WITH  FISHBONES

0.text: Toggle: Jinx switches between  Pow-Pow, her minigun, and  Fishbones, her rocket launcher.

1.text: Pow-Pow:  Basic attacks with Pow-Pow grant Jinx a stack of  Rev'd up for 2.5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent attacks with Pow-Pow. Rev'd up grants  bonus attack speed, with the first stack being twice as potent as the others. Stacks decay one at a time as they time-out.

2.text: Fishbones: Basic attacks with Fishbones cost  mana  on-attack to deal 110% AD modified physical damage to the primary target as well as all secondary targets in an area around them. The damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers. While using Fishbones,  Jinx gains  bonus range but loses  10% of her bonus attack speed.

3.text: Attacks with Fishbones will not refresh the stack timer on Rev'd up and only the first attack after switching to it will benefit from Rev'd up's bonus attack speed.

3.origin: CAST TIME: 0.6 − 0.4 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

0.text: Active: Jinx fires a shock blast in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy it hits and  reveals and  slows them for 2 seconds.

Active: Jinx tosses out 3 Chompers at the target location that land after 0.4 seconds in a perpendicular line, arming after 0.5 seconds and exploding after 5 seconds, dealing magic damage to all enemies within a small area.

1.text: A Chomper prematurely explodes on contact with an enemy  champion,  knocking them down and  rooting them for 1.5 seconds. An enemy champion can only set off and be damaged by one Chomper.

0.text: Active: Jinx fires a rocket in the target direction, granting brief  sight of the area it flies through. The rocket explodes upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing physical damage to them and all enemies in an area around them and granting  sight of the area around them for 2 seconds.

1.text: The rocket deals 10% − 100% (based on distance traveled) damage; the bonus damage based on missing health is kept the same.

origin: 250 / 400 / 550 (+ 150% bonus ad) (+ 25 / 30 / 35% of target's missing health)
25 / 40 / 55 (+ 15% bonus ad) (+ 25 / 30 / 35% of target's missing health)

2.text: Enemies surrounding the main target take 80% damage. Bonus damage based on missing health is based on each unit's own missing health, with a maximum bonus damage of 800 against  monsters.

origin: 200 / 320 / 440 (+ 120% bonus ad) (+ 20 / 24 / 28% of target's missing health)
20 / 32 / 44 (+ 12% bonus ad) (+ 20 / 24 / 28% of target's missing health)

1.concerningText: Fishbones: Basic attacks with Fishbones cost  mana  on-attack to deal 110% AD modified physical damage to the primary target as well as all secondary targets in an area around them. 2.origin: COST: 20 MANA PER ATTACK WITH  FISHBONES

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bring It Down: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to deal 60 (+ 45% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BRING IT DOWN: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 3 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack consumes all stacks on-attack to deal 60 (+ 45% bonus AD) bonus true damage on-hit.

+7% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Wind's Fury: Basic attacks on-attack fire additional bolts at up to 2 enemies in front of you, each dealing 40% AD physical damage. Bolts apply on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness and are affected by critical strike modifiers.
The bolts will target the closest enemies to you that are not the main target.
passive.originText:
UNIQUE – WIND'S FURY: Basic attacks on-attack fire additional bolts at up to 2 enemies in front of you, each dealing 40% AD physical damage. Bolts apply on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness and are affected by  critical strike modifiers.
The bolts will target the closest enemies to you that are not the main target.
